mapper.select: SELECT A.id , A.name , A.intr_dc , A.price , A.sort , A.menu_group_id , B.id AS file_id , B.origFilename , B.serverFilename , B.filePath , B.size FROM menu A LEFT OUTER JOIN files B ON A.file_id = B.id WHERE A.id = #{id} AND A.used = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menu(name, intr_dc, price, sort, menu_group_id, file_id) VALUES(#{name}, #{intrDc}, #{price}, #{sort}, #{menuGroupId}, #{uploadFile.id})
mapper.update: UPDATE menu SET file_id = null , used = 0 , update_at = now() WHERE id = #{id} AND used = 1
